title: The Spider King
description: You never know who or what is watching. Successful in business and unlucky in love, Abigail Mason plays the cards life has dealt her. Although lonely, she’s focused her talents on other aspects of her life. Bold, yet sassy, there’s one thing she fears most. Spiders.When the mysterious, hunky many appears in her bedroom out of the blue, Abigail thinks she’s lost her mind, especially once discovering there’s more to him than meets the eye.Spider king, Gwar has been observing introvert, Abigail for months within the very confines of her home. When he finally approaches the lovely woman with the smoldering bedroom eyes to woo her, he realizes he’s bitten off more than he can chew but as always he’s up for the challenge. Warning: This short, sexy, fantasy read will raise your blood pressure and leave you with a smile on your face.
author: Charisma Knight
